page.title: 09Work in Cheshunt
page.content: There are many people whose work brings then into our home such as the plumber,electrician,window cleaner and T.V. repair man.Many people come to the house but not into the home,like the paper boy,milk man and post man. A large part of our area is covered by nurseries and many people are employed in greenhouses. There are several places which sell flowers and garden produce. Near Brynfields nursery in Goffs Oak there is a man who sells logs. Because our area is so close to London many people commute by train or car. These work in advertising,stock broking,banking or are civil servants.
